author: dws
msg: * packages/rpm/redhat-8.x/subversion.spec : Changes to compile on RedHat 9.
The problem turned out to be the includes/libs built into apr/apr-util.
With the new httpd-2.0.46-0.2 and requisite apr-0.9.4-0.1 and
apr-util-0.9.4-0.1 packages it now compiles and builds on both RedHat 8.0
and RedHat 9.0.

author: kfogel
msg: Fix the copied subtree problem referred to in revision 6358:
Storing symbolic name roots in the skeleton repository mirror was
problematic because of -- surprise -- copied subtrees.  The paths
underneath the copied directory would wrongly claim to be origins of
the same tags and branches that their copy sources were origins of.
But we don't need the symbolic name root records to be versioned
anyway.  For a given path, we only need to know when we hit the
Subversion revision that opens a set of names, and when we hit the
next change (which closes that set).  Therefore, move the symbolic
name records out to a flat db mapping paths->namesets.
* tools/cvs2svn/cvs2svn.py
(SYMBOLIC_NAME_ROOTS_DB):
(SymbolicNameTracker.fill_branch.copy_descend): Fix typo.
(RepositoryMirror.__init__): Initialize new variables
symroots_db_file and symroots_db; remove variable symbolic_names.
Also, rearrange and redocument everything here.
(RepositoryMirror.probe_path): Return both key and value.
(RepositoryMirror.change_path): Copy nodes by value, not reference,
and record symbolic name roots in the new symroots_db instead of
in the repository mirror.
(RepositoryMirror.delete_path.is_prunable): Likewise return and
delete symbolic name roots from the new symroots_db, instead of
from the repository mirror.
(everywhere): Remove some old commented-out debugging prints.
* tools/cvs2svn/design-notes.txt: Change example to match the code.
With this change, branch creation, using a minimal number of copies,
happens for all branches on which there was at least one commit.  The
following problems remain:
1. Tags are still not created, nor are branches on which no commit
happens (i.e., the "cleanup stage" referred to in
design-notes.txt is not yet implemented).
2. Paths not on the branch are not correctly removed at branch
creation time.  For example, in revision 27 of the repository
created from test-data/main-cvsrepos, sub1/subsubB/default
should be taken out of the newly-created branch, but it is not.
3. There's clearly still some weirdness w.r.t. initial imports and
vendor branches, for example, see revisions 13 and 12 (if the
file "space fname" was correctly added in revision 12, why was
it necessary to modify it again in the copy made in revision
13?) or revision 17 and 16 (if all those paths were added in
revision 16, why are they modified in revision 17, which
according to the history [I think] should just be a straight
copy of the trunk with no further changes?).
Because of this, I've left the continue|pass switch in pass4() in the
'continue' position.  We won't turn on branch and tag creation at all
until it's fully correct.
